welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Macclesfield, a charming city nestled in the heart of the UK. Known for its rich history, stunning countryside, and friendly locals, we hope you take some time to explore and discover all that Macclesfield has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
